pages.privacy-policy: TopFantasyGameCricketPro - Privacy Policy TopFantasyGameCricketPro Privacy Policy Welcome to TopFantasyGameCricketPro! This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our fantasy cricket platform. By using TopFantasyGameCricketPro, you agree to the terms of this Privacy Policy. Information We Collect We collect information from you when you register on our site, place an order, subscribe to our newsletter, respond to a survey, or fill out a form. The information collected may include your name, email address, mailing address, phone number, or payment information. How We Use Your Information We may use the information we collect from you to: Personalize your experience and respond to your individual needs. Improve our website based on the information and feedback we receive from you. Process transactions and send periodic emails regarding your orders or other products and services. Administer contests, promotions, surveys, or other site features. Security of Your Information We implement a variety of security measures to maintain the safety of your personal information when you enter, submit, or access your personal information. Changes to Our Privacy Policy If we decide to change our Privacy Policy, we will post those changes on this page. It is your responsibility to review this Privacy Policy periodically and become aware of modifications.
